cause.description:
Battered puppy needs operations Black Labrador found in a ditch dehydrated and with broken legs A black Labrador puppy needs your help after she was found abandoned in a ditch near Shubenacadie on Wednesday, dehydrated and starving, her two front legs broken and her bones showing through her fur.
The puppy’s injuries appear to be from a beating, not from being hit by a car.
Anyone interested in helping or adopting Lilly can contact the Labrador Rescue Club at 883-4799 or visit its website at www.labrescuens.com.
The Beneficiary: International Fund for Animal Welfare, Inc is not the beneficiary but i could not find the rescue club in facebook.
1. help a defenseless puppy
2. find the people responsable
cause.mission: thanks to all the support i've been told that lilly has enough money now..She is doing well. Go to the rescue website if you would like to learn more about lilly or other dogs looking for a home
cause.name: Lilly, the Labrador puppy
